label: 桂
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: Cercidiphyllum Japonicum, a kind of tree with heart-shaped leaves, resembling a laurel and believed in East Asia to grow in the moon.  Its leaves, with those of heart-to-heart (aoi) were as decorations for the Kamo Festival.[葵、賀茂][RK]
